评论概述: A good bargain, love the fit in the waist especially
评论详情: For reference, I'm 5ft 7inches tall, 136 lbs. My legs are medium size, and my waist is wider than I wish it was!  With that in mind, I love the fit on my waist. The construction of the waistband is flat stretchy in front and stretchy pulled material in back, making the fit soft and comfy. I could be thinner or wider in my waist and it feels like it would still fit just right.  The leg material is quite wide in my estimation, especially since it's a stretchy sturdy material, so on my medium size legs it looks a bit bulky. Not so much that I can't wear them, just I wish they were about 2-4 inches narrower on each leg.  On the other hand, since the material is a bit heavy, you could easily wear these over leggings on cold, cold winter days. I bet they would keep your legs toasty warm.  I do like the cargo pants design with pockets on the side of the legs, with real and useful pockets both front and back on the pants.  Overall, I like these. A bit too warm for hot summer days, but fall and winter are on the way. For ~$20 (at this writing), they are a good bargain.

These pants are so nice.  They’re stretchy and comfortable to wear. They have so many pockets and they’re stylish!  The pants are well-made, they fit just right, and the movement is easy. I like the pockets, the stretch, the color and the feel. Definitely recommend

These high-waisted cargo pants are a great find! The stretchy fabric offers a comfortable fit, allowing for ease of movement throughout the day. The material feels nice to the touch, and the design is both practical and stylish, with the added bonus of functional pockets. Perfect for a casual yet chic look, these pants are a must-have in any wardrobe.

评论概述: So stretchy and comfortable!!!! Passes the squat test with no crack showing.
评论详情: I have been searching high and low for a comfortable pair of black cargo pants for work. I have a curvy figure with wide hips and a smaller waist so finding pants that fit is a nightmare. These pants though have so much stretch to them that they fit almost like a pair of sweat pants. The material seems of good quality and will last a while. My only issue is there are no closures on the cargo pockets, just a loose flap. This is an easy fix though with a little stripe of Velcro. Overall I'm really happy with these pants!

The grey color is more like charcoal. And while there are six pockets, none are very deep, and the side cargo pockets have a fold over flap, not attached for closure purposes. Material is stretchy and slightly slippery, so these cargos are more like a cross between leggings and soft jeans. These are pull-ons with an elasticized waist in back and smooth front band that does not roll or pinch. Straight leg with just about perfect length for petite women. Medium fit as expected, slightly relaxed but not baggy.

These pants are stretchy, but the material is a bit heavy for my taste. They feel like stretchy suit pants. They’re form-fitting, so if you’re not wearing the right underwear, you might get a visible panty line. I do appreciate the high waist with the elastic band, though there’s no tummy support, and since they’re form-fitting, they highlight every curve. I’m not skinny or big (170 lb, 5'4"), so I paired them with a comfortable, loose-fitting top. The pants legs become a bit looser as they go lower. Overall, I like them, but for me, they’re better suited for fall or winter.

These pants are so much nicer in person I took a chance on them and I’m glad I did. Definitely recommend these pants so many pockets and they’re so comfortable!
The pants are well-made and comfortable. They fit just right in all ways and movement is easy. I like the pockets, the stretch, the color and the feel.
